Class SeoController

  • java.lang.Object

public class SeoController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getRobotsTxt

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value={"/robots.txt","/robots"},
                produces="text/plain")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getRobotsTxt()
        Returns information about the site for search engines. Request mapping: /robots.txt, /robots Produces: text/plain
        Returns:
        The information about a site.

      • getSiteMapXml

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value={"/sitemap.xml","/sitemap"},
                produces="application/xml")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getSiteMapXml()
        Creates and returns a sitemap. This is a list of all pages on the site, which consists of the links to these pages. Request mapping: /sitemap.xml, /sitemap Produces: text/plain
        Returns:
        Information about links on the site to search engines.
